mapper.select: SELECT T1.*,T3.employee_name FROM ss_month_emp_change_detail T1 INNER JOIN ss_month_emp_change T2 ON T2.month_emp_change_id = T1.month_emp_change_id AND T2.is_active = '1' AND T1.month_emp_change_id = #{monthEmpChangeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} LEFT JOIN emp_employee T3 ON T1.employee_id = T3.employee_id WHERE 1=1 AND T1.is_active = '1' ORDER BY T1.employee_id,T1.change_type,T1.ss_type

SELECT mecd.* FROM ss_month_emp_change_detail mecd INNER JOIN ss_month_emp_change mec ON mec.month_emp_change_id = mecd.month_emp_change_id WHERE mecd.is_active = 1 AND mec.statement_id = #{statementId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT
FROM ss_month_emp_change a INNER JOIN ss_com_account b ON a.com_account_id = b.com_account_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT month_emp_change_id, employee_id, change_type, change_type_name, base_amount, MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00042',com_amount,'')) AS 'pension_com_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00042',emp_amount,'')) AS 'pension_emp_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00042',com_compensate_amount,'')) AS 'pension_com_repay_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00042',emp_compensate_amount,'')) AS 'pension_emp_repay_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00042',one_payment,'')) AS 'pension_one_payment', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00043',com_amount,'')) AS 'medical_com_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00043',emp_amount,'')) AS 'medical_emp_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00043',com_compensate_amount,'')) AS 'medical_com_repay_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00043',emp_compensate_amount,'')) AS 'medical_emp_repay_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00046',com_amount,'')) AS 'unemployment_com_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00046',emp_amount,'')) AS 'unemployment_emp_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00046',com_compensate_amount,'')) AS 'unemployment_com_repay_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00046',emp_compensate_amount,'')) AS 'unemployment_emp_repay_amount' FROM ss_month_emp_change_detail WHERE is_active = 1 GROUP BY month_emp_change_id, employee_id, change_type, change_type_name, base_amount ) c ON a.month_emp_change_id = c.month_emp_change_id LEFT JOIN emp_employee d ON c.employee_id = d.employee_id WHERE a.is_active = 1 AND b.is_active = 1 AND a.month_emp_change_id = #{monthEmpChangeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT
FROM ss_month_emp_change a INNER JOIN ss_com_account b ON a.com_account_id = b.com_account_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT month_emp_change_id, employee_id, change_type, change_type_name, base_amount, MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00044',com_amount,'')) AS 'accident_com_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00044',com_compensate_amount,'')) AS 'accident_com_repay_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00045',com_amount,'')) AS 'maternity_com_amount', MAX(IF(ss_type='DIT00045',com_compensate_amount,'')) AS 'maternity_com_repay_amount' FROM ss_month_emp_change_detail WHERE is_active = 1 GROUP BY month_emp_change_id, employee_id, change_type, change_type_name, base_amount ) c ON a.month_emp_change_id = c.month_emp_change_id LEFT JOIN emp_employee d ON c.employee_id = d.employee_id WHERE a.is_active = 1 AND b.is_active = 1 AND a.month_emp_change_id = #{monthEmpChangeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: a.month_emp_change_id, a.ss_month, a.com_account_id, b.com_account_name, c.employee_id, d.employee_name, c.change_type, c.change_type_name, c.base_amount, c.pension_com_amount, c.pension_emp_amount, c.pension_com_repay_amount, c.pension_emp_repay_amount, c.pension_one_payment, c.medical_com_amount, c.medical_emp_amount, c.medical_com_repay_amount, c.medical_emp_repay_amount, c.unemployment_com_amount, c.unemployment_emp_amount, c.unemployment_com_repay_amount, c.unemployment_emp_repay_amount

a.month_emp_change_id, a.ss_month, a.com_account_id, b.com_account_name, c.employee_id, d.employee_name, c.change_type, c.change_type_name, c.base_amount, c.accident_com_amount, c.accident_com_repay_amount, c.maternity_com_amount, c.maternity_com_repay_amount
